data.title: Home
data.meta_description: For more than 60 years, scientists at SVI have been inspired by discovery and driven by purpose. Our team of around 250 staff and students work collaboratively to tackle critical health challenges, including cancer, diabetes, osteoporosis, heart disease, infectious disease and dementia.
data.text:
For more than 65 years, scientists at SVI have been inspired by discovery and driven by purpose. At SVI, our mission is to produce world-class science with the aim of transforming lives through medical discovery.

When racehorse trainer Jack Holt died in 1951, leaving 200,000 pounds to establish SVI, he could not have imagined the impact of his generosity.

In 2023, SVI celebrated 65 years since our lab doors first opened. This Research Review celebrates the achievements of our dedicated staff and highlights their drive to make a difference â€“ inspired by discovery and driven by purpose.
